summary: E-commerce website for Kishan Dairy, a dairy products business delivering in Sitamarhi, Bihar
architectural_notes: E-commerce platform for dairy products business
Geographic delivery restriction to Sitamarhi, Bihar region

existing_features.title: Create a homepage that displays 'Kishan Dairy' as the shop name prominently in the header
Display a prominent notice that delivery is available only in Sitamarhi, Bihar
Create a product listing page that displays all available dairy products with their images, names, prices, and units
Implement a shopping cart system where users can add dairy products, adjust quantities, and view their cart total
Create an order placement system that collects customer name, phone number, delivery address in Sitamarhi, and stores the order with selected products

Design a warm, clean, and trustworthy visual theme using earthy tones (greens, creams, browns) that evokes fresh, farm-quality dairy products, with clear typography and spacious layouts that work well for a local business
Render generated images for dairy products and shop branding as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated
Display an 'Instant Delivery' badge or indicator on product cards for products that have instant delivery enabled

new_feature_requests.summary: Create e-commerce website for dairy products
Show delivery area limited to Sitamarhi, Bihar
Create a product catalog backend that stores dairy products with fields for product name, description, price, unit (liters/kg), image reference, and availability status
Add a new boolean field 'isInstant' to the Product type in the backend to indicate whether a product is available for instant delivery
Update all existing dairy products in the product catalog to have instant delivery enabled (isInstant = true)
